kv19.1:5.3: Niruddhaṃ nirodheti, vigataṃ vigameti, khīṇaṃ khepeti, atthaṅgataṃ atthaṅgameti, abbhatthaṅgataṃ abbhatthaṅgametīti?
kv19.1:5.10: Hañci atītaṃ niruddhaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv19.1:5.16: Hañci atītaṃ natthi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv19.1:6.3: Ajātaṃ ajaneti, asañjātaṃ asañjaneti, anibbattaṃ anibbatteti, apātubhūtaṃ apātubhāvetīti?
kv19.1:6.10: Hañci anāgataṃ ajātaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv19.1:6.16: Hañci anāgataṃ natthi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv19.1:7.3: Ratto rāgaṃ jahati, duṭṭho dosaṃ jahati, mūḷho mohaṃ jahati, kiliṭṭho kilese jahatīti?
kv19.1:7.6: rāgena rāgaṃ jahati, dosena dosaṃ jahati, mohena mohaṃ jahati, kilesehi kilese jahatīti?
kv19.1:9.3: Kusalākusalā sāvajjānavajjā hīnapaṇītā kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā dhammā sammukhībhāvaṃ āgacchantīti?
kv19.1:10.1: Kusalākusalā sāvajjānavajjā hīnapaṇītā kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā dhammā sammukhībhāvaṃ āgacchantīti?
kv19.1:11.2: “atīte kilese jahati, anāgate kilese jahati, paccuppanne kilese jahatī”ti?
kv19.1:11.7: tena hi atīte kilese jahati, anāgate kilese jahati, paccuppanne kilese jahatīti.
